title: Hacking ADHD: Strategies for the modern developer

title: Gut epithelial barrier damage caused by dishwasher detergents and rinse aids
dot:
digraph FoodAllergyGastrointestinalDisease{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue]; Background[label="Background
Increased prevalence of chronic inflammatory diseases
linked to gut epithelial barrier leakiness", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgrey];Objective[label="Objective
Investigate effects of dishwashers and rinse agents
on gastrointestinal epithelial cells", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgrey];Methods[label="Methods
- Establish enterocytic liquid-liquid interfaces
- Assess cytotoxicity, barrier function, transcriptome
- Perform proteomics", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgrey];Results[label="Results
- Detergent toxicity linked to rinse aid
- Disrupted epithelial barrier observed
- Upregulation of cell death, inflammation, and immune responses", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgrey];Conclusions[label="Conclusions
- Rinse aid alters gene expression related to cell survival
- Alcohol ethoxylates identified as damaging component", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgrey]; Background->Objective;Objective->Methods;Methods->Results;Results->Conclusions;KeyTerms[label="Key Terms
- Alcohol ethoxylates
- Cytotoxicity
- Epithelial barrier
- Inflammation
- Dishwasher detergents", shape=rectangle, fillcolor=lightyellow]; Conclusions->KeyTerms[label="Related Terms", style=dashed];}
